text: William Whyte may refer to: *William Whyte (railway manager) (1843–1914), Canadian Pacific Railway Company executive *William Foote Whyte (1914–2000), sociologist *William H. Whyte (1917–1999), sociologist and author of The Organization Man *William Pinkney Whyte (1824–1908), politician from the State of Maryland, United States *William Whyte (runner) (1903–1964), Australian athlete *William Whyte (footballer), Scottish footballer *William Whyte (historian) (born 1975), architectural and social historian *Sir William Whyte (banker) (died 1945), Scottish banker *Sir William Whyte (solicitor) (died 1950), British solicitor *Sir William Marcus Charles Beresford Whyte (1863–1932), British naval officer *Sir (William Erskine) Hamilton Whyte (1927–1990), British diplomat *Bill Whyte, professor of social work at the University of Edinburgh ==See also== *William White (disambiguation)
title: William Whyte
